plot: A newly married man moves into his wife's parents' house to save money, only to have his life completely taken over by her father (Dennis Farina).
plot_en: A newly married man moves into his wife's parents' house to save money, only to have his life completely taken over by her father (Dennis Farina).
plot_es: A newly married man moves into his wife's parents' house to save money, only to have his life completely taken over by her father (Dennis Farina).
title: In-Laws
